personalInfo.family: Wife, Laura; Ryan Allgood (12/30/79), Sara Allgood (5/6/83)

tourBios.otherInfo: Member of the PGA TOUR in 1991-92 and 1995 and BUY.COM TOUR in 1990 and 1999...made the cut in 13 of 17 events in 1999 and had 5 top-10 and 9 top-25 finishes...after missing the cut in three of his first four events, came on strong in the latter part of the season, making the cut in 12 of his last 13 tournaments...third-round 64 put him in a tie for third after 54 holes of the Greensboro Open...tied the course-record with a 10-under-par 62 in the opening round of the 1999 Permian Basin Open...led that event after each of the first three rounds and tied for second place...trailed third-round leader Joel Edwards by one stroke at the Boise Open...Posted a final-day 74 and tied for eighth in Idaho...was one stroke out of the 36- hole lead at the New Mexico Classic...ranked No. 4 in Driving Accuracy Percentage (72.6%) and No. 8 in Scoring Average Before the Cut (70.65)...career-best finish on the PGA TOUR is a T4 at the 1995 Deposit Guaranty Classic, where he led by one after 54 holes...two-time winner on the BUY.COM TOUR in 1990, taking titles at the Baton Rouge Open and the Elizabethtown Open...played all 30 events that year, with 20 cuts made and 14 top-25 finishes.

dyn.dynResults: He has finished 1st on the Web.com Tour 2 times.
